name: Harbinger of Dawn
description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
descriptionRaw: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
story:
This sword has an extraordinary full name:
The Triumphant Harbinger of Dawn that Points Towards Victory.
Only one has ever fallen by this blade on the battlefield.
One night, the bearer drew the sword triumphantly.
The night sky lit up as bright as day,
pin-pointing his precise location.
Arrows rained down upon him.
effectTemplateRaw: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by <color=#99FFFFFF>{0}</color>.
